structure.summary:
The partial document provides details about derivative securities transactions, specifically employee stock options. The main points covered in the document are:

1. Transaction details for the employee stock options, including the title, conversion or exercise price, transaction date, transaction code, number of derivative securities acquired or disposed of, date exercisable and expiration date, title and amount of securities underlying the derivative security, price of the derivative security, number of derivative securities beneficially owned following the reported transaction, ownership form (direct or indirect), and nature of indirect beneficial ownership.
2. The employee stock options were granted pursuant to the Caterpillar Inc. 2014 Long-Term Incentive Plan on March 4, 2019 and vest equally in 1/3 increments in the first, second, and third anniversaries of the grant date.
3. The reporting person undertakes to provide full information regarding the number of shares and prices at which the transaction was effected upon request to the SEC staff, the issuer or a security holder of the issuer.
4. The document includes a reminder for reporting multiple classes of securities beneficially owned directly or indirectly, instructions for filing the form when more than one reporting person is involved, and legal consequences for intentional misstatements or omissions of facts.
5. The document also includes instructions for handling insufficient space on the form and notes that persons who respond to the collection of information contained in this form are not required to respond unless the form displays a currently valid OMB Number.
